column4: hi guys... I have a USB-HD case here with a HD that i took from a Raid-1 NAS... how can i mount it? i do not know what device it is
it will only be useful in that RAID unless you reformat it.
really? duh... I am a bit at a losss... I bought two new larger HDs for my NAS... How can I transfer the data to the new HDs then?
depends on the NAS, but one method that will work for sure is to first make a backup of the data with the hard drives still in the NAS.
